name: Cairns City Backpackers
description:
Check-in is from 1400. Let us know in advance if you are going to arrive outside reception hours so we can organise your key (if you are arriving by flight after midnight make sure you book your first night for the correct arrival date (usually this will be the date your flight departed). Our reception is open from 9am till 1630.

We offer clean and comfortable double, 4 and 6 bed dorms.

We have a strict over 18 policy only.

No noise after 10:30pm.

We are an international hostel. We only accept guests with an international passport and 2 Week maximum stay. Do not book longer online, further bookings will not be accepted.

The friendly and helpful staff have lots of good local advice and information about tours including access to standby specials.

groupInformation.terms: Group bookings not accepted from June till November inclusive (our busy season).
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Cancellation / No Show & Reduction in Numbers Policy
Should you cancel your confirmed group reservation within 1 week of your arrival date you will lose your deposit.
Should you cancel your confirmed group reservation outside of 1 week from the arrival date, no cancellation fee applies.

Should numbers or room selection change, the per person deposit times the number of people who actually travelled will be deducted from the total accommodation charge levvied by the hostel providing you notify us of any change outside of 1 week from the arrival date.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Additional Terms and Conditions

Depending on group - security bond may apply

houseRules.notes:
We have a 48hr cancellation policy. By making a reservation with your credit / debit card you authorise Cairns City Backpackers to charge one night's room charge to your card without further reference to you, in the event that you cancel your reservation less than 48 hours from your agreed check-in time or in the event that you fail to arrive. Non-arrival will result in the cancellation of your entire reservation. Any changes to your reservation must be notified to and agreed with the accommodation provider directly, and are at the discretion of the accommodation provider.

If you pay by credit card on arrival we will charge you 3% if your card is a non Australian card, and 1% if it is an Australian card. 

Cancellation/No Show Policy and Fees:  We have a 48hr cancellation policy.  By making a reservation with your credit / debit card you authorize Cairns City Backpackers  to charge one night's room charge to your card without further reference to you if you cancel your reservation less than 48 hours before your arrival date,  or in the event that you fail to arrive (No Show). Non-arrival (No Show) will result in the TOTAL price of the accommodation being charged to your credit card, and your reservation will be cancelled.  If you need to make any changes to your arrival date, you MUST notify the hostel directly, and all changes are at the discretion of the accommodation provider (cancellation fees may apply if you request to change your arrival date less that 48 hours prior to your original arrival date).
 
All guests will be charged a damage deposit of AU$100 on arrival to cover any damage during their stay and loss of keys.

Please note in the case of multiple person dorm bookings, whilst every effort is made to keep all members of your travel party in the same room when available, it is not guaranteed, especially if you are booking close to your arrival date and as we are a small hostel.  We recommend you book at least one week in advance to minimize the chance that you might need to be separated.  This booking page does not check or guarantee you will all be together.
